title: Help me with spacing please
content:
This is a logo for a roman germanic museum. Its a fictitious project for a course in my university.

The lines are take from the concrete slabs at the building. The font is done by myself. You can also take a look at its process here.

[http://typophile.com/node/47055](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011060927/http:/typophile.com/node/47055 "http://typophile.com/node/47055")

Thank you for help

Bye: Steven

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [\_Logo.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011060927/http:/typophile.com/files/_Logo.pdf) | 21.08 KB |
author: stw

comments.content: There seems to be too much space between the C and the H on both the first and second line. The R, M and A could also be tightened. The M's and U's in museum seem to be off too. Perhaps tweak the type when it isn't reversed out of black too.
